com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FKeyValueTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FTable
          • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FKeyValueTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener
    Deprecated. 
    - use ftable2 instead

    public class FKeyValueTable
extends FTable
    This class represents a UI table view. It renders the contents backed by a TableModel. - resize is possible with own java script extension - sortable and resize behaviour can be defined with setter functions
    Author:
    as

      • FKeyValueTable

        public FKeyValueTable(java.lang.String id,
              com.fluidops.ajax.models.FTableModel model,
              int numberOfRows,
              double[] columnWidth)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a new FKeyValueTable with given ID and table model. In addition numberOfRows and columnWidth can be specified Note: - sortable and resizeable by default. Use setter functions to change - table control is rendered if more pages are available or if showTableControl flag is set to true (default is false)
        Parameters:
        id -
        model -
        numberOfRows - the number of rendered rows, if -1 "model.getRowCount()" rows are rendered, but at most 10
        columnWidth -

        public java.lang.String render()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: FContainer
        draw the HTML anchors of the kids - populate view will be triggered from the page since the components are all registered. The specific implementation should override this method since it only providers a very basic layout
